ValidationRule.description: Prevents this field from being updated if the Request has not been approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = "01260000000166y" && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Approval_Status__c , "Approved")) && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot set the Date Changed field for Requisitions that have not been approved.
